author: hrkrshnn
content: Do you have specific comments on what's better?

author: andrewhong5297
content: Better compiler/vs code extensions, math support (with any module crate too), standardized error/revert messages using crates to start with

author: andrewhong5297
content: I also like traits + structs + impl better for complex data types

author: andrewhong5297
content: Also just the main language used by top other chains in general

author: andrewhong5297
content: Overall dev experience is still better on EVM tho but can't say for what that might be like a year from now

author: andrewhong5297
content: Doing a write up on this rn

author: hrkrshnn
content: Nice. I would like to read it after it's finished!
